title: Mac play button=black screen
body: hi there, wondering if anybody could help. so today i was playing lol and then i got on later again and when i pressed "play" , i entered the game but when it launched the new tab, it was a black screen and whenever i tried to press anything it would make a blocking sound. by the way, i am on a mac and i was just wondering if anybody could help out, thanks!

replies.body:
Ah, the blocking sound was just the context I needed to figure out what was going on!

These error sounds usually occur when your client is having a hard time connecting to our gameservers. This most often happens if there are problematic local network settings that are blocking League. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if this resolved your issues or not.
